ing: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1 (8 ounce) can water chestnuts, drained and chopped
des: "Water chestnuts add a delightful twist to this chilled spinach dip. Serve with wheat crackers or rye bread. I hope you will enjoy this. My family loves it!"
ins: In a medium bowl, mix together spinach, sour cream, mayonnaise, dry vegetable soup mix, water chestnuts and green onions. Cover and chill in the refrigerator approximately 2 hours before serving.
